A reading course in statistical sciences held in the summer term of 2023 at university Bielefeld. Taking the wonderful book *Causal Inference - The Mixtape* by Scott Cunningham as a structuring guideline. Students had to present one method in each week and we discussed empirical papers applying these techniques all together.
